title: 8g: "out of fixed registers"
body:
by **s.yu.skorobogatov**: 
1. What is a short input program that triggers the error?

See attachment.
Program is not so short, but two months ago compiler processed it quite well.

2. What is the full compiler output?

registers allocated at
AX 0
CX 0
DX 0
BX 0x804de2f
SP 0
BP 0x804de2f
SI 0x804de2f
DI 0x80545f1
chars.go:301: out of fixed registers
chars.go:301: internal compiler error: regfree: reg not allocated

3. What version of the compiler are you using?  (Run it with the -V flag.)

8g version 5631+ release.2010-06-09 release
Attachments: 1. src.tar.gz (14206 bytes)
